title: Running Synthetic Tests in a CI/CD Pipeline
description: This is an intermediate-level course based largely on the Move Fast Without Breaking Things Dash 2020 Workshop. It will introduce robust, end-to-end Synthetics tests to catch deployment regressions, and then integrate these tests into a CI/CD workflow with Synthetics CI/CD.

courses.title: Using Synthetic Tests to Catch Regressions
courses.description: An introduction to creating the three types of Datadog Synthetic tests to catch regressions.

courses.title: Running Synthetic Tests in a CI/CD Pipeline
courses.description: Using Datadog Synthetic tests in a series of deployment strategies to automate end-to-end browser tests as part of a CI/CD pipeline.
